Interface Fraction

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Fraction>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FractionImpl
public interface Fraction extends Comparable<Fraction>
Fraction interface represents a rational number. It extends Comparable to provide ordering based on the fraction's value.
